1.t: We sent Noah to his people telling him, "Warn your people before a painful torment approaches them".
1.tr: Innaaa arsalnaa Noohan ilaa qawmihee an anzir qawmaka min qabli any yaatiyahum 'azaabun aleem

2.t: Noah said, "My people, I am warning you plainly.
2.tr: Qaala yaa-qawmi innee lakum nazeerum mubeen

3.t: Worship God, have fear of Him and obey me.

4.t: He will forgive your sins and give you a respite for an appointed time. When the time which God has appointed arrives, none will be able to postpone it. Would that you knew this!"
4.tr: Yaghfir lakum min zunoobikum Wa-yu'akhkhirkum ilaaa ajalim musammaa; innaa ajalal laahi izaa jaaa'a laa yu'akhkhar; law kuntum ta'lamoon

5.t: Noah said, "My Lord, I have been preaching to my people, night and day,
5.tr: Qaala rabbi innee da'awtu qawmee lailanw Wa-naharaa

6.t: but it has had no effect on them except to make them run away.

7.t: Evert time I invite them to Your (guidance) so that You can forgive them, they put their fingers into their ears, cover their heads with their clothes, persist in their disbelief and display extreme arrogance.
7.tr: Wa-inee kullamaa da'awtuhum litaghfira lahum ja'alooo asaabi'ahum fee aazaanihim wastaghshaw siyaabahum Wa-asarroo wastakbarus tikbaaraa

8.t: "I preached to them aloud, in public.

9.t: Then I conveyed the message to them, again, both in public and in private,
9.tr: Summaa inneee a'lantu lahum Wa-asrartu lahum israaraa

10.t: and told them, "Ask forgiveness from your Lord; He is All-forgiving".
10.tr: Faqultus taghfiroo Rabakum innahoo kaana Ghaffaaraa

12.tr: Wa-yumdidkum bi-am-waalinw Wa-baneena Wa-yaj'al lakum Jannaatinw Wa-yaj'al lakum anhaaraa

13.t: strengthen you by (providing) you wealth and children, and make gardens and streams for you. What is the matter with you that you are not afraid of the greatness of God
13.tr: Maa lakum laa tarjoona lillaahi waqaaraa

14.t: who has created you in several stages?

15.t: "Have you not seen that God has created the seven heavens one above the other
15.tr: Alam taraw kaifa khalaqal laahu sab'a samaawaatin tibaaqaa

16.t: and placed therein the moon as a light
16.tr: Wa-ja'alal qamara feehinna nooranw Wa-ja'alash shamsa siraajaa

17.t: and the sun as a torch.

18.t: God made you grow from the earth. He will make you return to it and then take you out of it again.

19.t: God has spread out the earth

20.t: for you, so that you may walk along its wide roads".

21.t: Noah said, "Lord, they have disobeyed me and followed those whose wealth and children will only bring about destruction for them.
21.tr: Qaala Noohur Rabbi innahum 'asawnee wattaba'oo mal lam yazid-hu maaluhoo Wa-waladuhooo illaa khasaara

22.t: They have arrogantly plotted evil plans against me,

23.t: and have said to each other, 'Do not give-up your idols. Do not renounce Wadd, Suwa`, Yaghuth, Ya`uq and Nasr (names of certain idols).
23.tr: Wa-qaaloo laa tazarunna aalihatakum Wa-laa tazarunna Waddanw Wa-laa Suwaa'anw Wa-laa Yaghoosa Wa-Ya'ooqa Wa-Nasraa

24.t: They have misled many and the unjust will achieve nothing but more error".
24.tr: Wa-qad adalloo kasee-ranw Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa dalaalaa

25.t: Because of their sins, they were drowned and made to enter hell. They could find no one to help them besides God.
25.tr: Mimmaa khateee'-aatihim ughriqoo fa-udkhiloo Naaran falam yajidoo lahum min doonil laahi ansaaraa

26.t: Noah said, "Lord, do not leave a single disbeliever on earth;
26.tr: Wa-qaala Noohur Rabbi laa tazar 'alal ardi minal kaafireena daiyaaraa

27.t: if You do, they will mislead Your servants and will only give birth to ungrateful sinners.
27.tr: Innaka in tazarhum yudil-loo 'ibaadaka Wa-laa yalidooo illaa faajiran kaffaaraa

28.t: Lord, forgive me, my parents, the believers who have entered my home and all believing men and women. Give nothing to the unjust but destruction.
28.tr: Rabbigh fir lee Wa-liwaa-lidaiya Wa-liman dakhala baitiya mu'minanw Wa-lil-mu'mineena wal-mu'minaati Wa-laa tazidiz zaalimeena illaa tabaaraa
